page.title: 05Employment
page.content: Not many people from Skirlaugh work in the village, just a few at the Council Offices. Most people go into Hull to work but some go to Beverley or Hornsea or some other villages. Not many people work on the farms but there are a lot of teachers live here. We were going to make a chart of the number of people doing each job but there were too many with just one person so people do all sorts of different kinds of jobs but most of them work in offices or shops or schools. Most of the people go to work in their cars but some have got cars from the firm. A few people don't go to work because they are too old or because they can't get a job. My dad says some of them are too lazy to work.
